data.actual_result: Glitches out and displays both the content of the NSFW channel and your friends list
data.expected_result: Returns to the friends list just fine
data.short_description: When clicking no on NSFW warnings, the client glitches out when returning to friends list
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel marked as NSFW - Say "nope" to the NSFW warning - observe
